titleStmt.title: The capitall lawes of New-England, as they stand now in force in the Common-wealth. By the court, in the years 1641. 1642 Capitall lawes, established within the iurisdiction of Massachusets.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed first in New-England, and re-printed in London for Ben. Allen in Popes-head Allen [sic],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
